SEARCH
Package com.example.webshop.db

Class OrderDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.webshop.bo.Order
com.example.webshop.db.OrderDB
public class OrderDB extends Order
Manages database operations related to orders in the webshop. Extends the Order class to provide additional database functionalities.
Since:
2023-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Johansson

  • Method Details

    • getOrderByID

      public static OrderDB getOrderByID(int orderID)
      Retrieves a specific order from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      OrderDB Object containing order details or null if not found.

    • sendOrder

      public static boolean sendOrder(int orderID)
      Updates the status of a specific order to 'sent'.
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to be updated.
      Returns:
      boolean True if the update is successful.

    • getAllOrders

      public static Collection<Order> getAllOrders()
      Fetches all orders from the database.
      Returns:
      Collection Collection of all Order objects.

    • getOrderByStatus

      public static Collection<Order> getOrderByStatus(String status)
      Fetches orders from the database with a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status of the orders to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      Collection Collection of Order objects with the given status.

    • placeOrder

      public static boolean placeOrder(Order order, User user) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new order into the database.
      Parameters:
      order - Order object containing order details.
      user - User object containing user details.
      Returns:
      boolean True if the insertion is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • updateInventory

      public static boolean updateInventory(ArrayList<CartItem> cartList)
      Updates the inventory quantities for items that are part of an order. If the item quantity becomes zero, the status is set to 'OUT_OF_STOCK'.
      Parameters:
      cartList - ArrayList of CartItem objects that are part of the order.
      Returns:
      boolean True if inventory is successfully updated, otherwise false.

    • createOrder

      public static int createOrder(User user)
      Inserts a new order record in the database for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - User object containing user details.
      Returns:
      int The generated order ID if successful, otherwise 0.

    • insertPurchaseDetails

      public static void insertPurchaseDetails(int newOrderId, Order order)
      Inserts the details of purchased items for a new order into the database.
      Parameters:
      newOrderId - The ID of the new order.
      order - Order object containing the details of the order.
